Description:
Town block in quiet location on 1110m2
With a scenic outlook, in an elevated location, this lovely corner block has dual frontage ideal for development and a pleasant walk or short drive to the shops & cafes in historic Fraser Street.
Established shade trees including fruit trees, is fully fenced with town water connected & power available. Central Highlands Water have advised that this block could be serviced with a pressure system until such time that a gravity fed system was available at the location. Zoned Township.
Insights: 2 Lothair Street, Clunes VIC 3370 was last sold in 2019.

Description:
The Family Entertainer
From the moment you step into the airy foyer, there is plenty of room to move in this spacious 4bedroom brick home. Built approximately 8years ago by Miles & Co, the delightfully designed home will not disappoint. Four generous sized bedrooms all with built in robes, master bedroom complete with walk in robe, ensuite features expressive black wall and floor tiles with a 1.5metre walk in shower, and separate water closet.
The well-appointed kitchen features solid granite island bench with double sink and breakfast bar, under bench dishwasher, and pendant feature lighting. Extensive cabinetry plus walk in pantry to host all the daily appliances leaving the workspace clear for the budding chef of the house to utilise the Ariston double wall oven paired with benchtop induction hotplates.
Double sliding doors open out into the alfresco area, boasting an additional bbq café/bar style space to sit and enjoy on all occasions with family and friends. Perfect for those warmer weather gatherings.
The home is positioned on an attractive 13,500 m2 triangular shaped parcel of land open and easy-care mowing with lightly scatter gums for that real country feel.
Only minutes to the heart of Clunes, Victorias first gold town, rich in history and creativity. Approximately 30 minutes to both Ballarat and Maryborough, Clunes the perfect place to relocate the entire family.
Features Include:
4 bedrooms all with carpet floor coverings, built in robes and TV points
Master bedroom, double doors, walk in robe, ensuite and water closet.
Spacious open kitchen/living
Second living room or the ideal childrens games room
Walk in linen/storage room
Walk in pantry
Main bathroom, separate shower and bath plus vanity
Separate toilet
Wall to wall storage in laundry plus overhead cupboards above machine and sink area
Attractive solid granite island bench
Spacious lining room with solid fuel heater and Daiken reverse cycle split system
Outdoor alfresco dining, plus bbq bar area with shade blinds
Aquamax Electric hot water
Double lock up garage with remote roller door
Low maintenance property
Tank water
Insights: 25 Cemetery Road, Clunes VIC 3370 was last sold in 2019 and 11 other 4 bedroom house in Clunes have recently been sold.

Description:
6 acres within minutes of Historic Clunes town centre
If you would you like to relax with stunning sunsets & a picturesque countryside vista with the Majestic Mt Beckworth as a backdrop then this is the one for you.
The 12mx12m shed is divided into two sections is powered with a concrete floor. Easy access via 2 roller doors as well as front entry slider.
Features a loft for extra storage.
Includes 20,000 litre water tank
Gum & Native planting along the boundary have provided a lovely private location.
Idyllic lifestyle potential (STCA).
Less than 5km to Clunes town centre shops & cafes.
Tank & dam water with telephone available.
Zoned Rural Living (RLZ)
Centrally located for easy 30 min drive to Daylesford, Maryborough or Ballarat to name a few. Attractions including local wineries, Dunach Nature Reserve, Major Mitchell Bicentennial Trail, Clunes Golf Course and the famous Talbot Farmers Market.
For more information please contact Angela Flowers on 0417 949 066
Insights: 5 Beckworth Court Road, Clunes VIC 3370 was last sold in 2019.

Prime location, only approx 25 minutes to Maryborough or Ballarat. Minutes to the center of Clunes township.
Don't delay, snap up this great block and begin building your dream home

Description:
A Perfect Place to Start.
Beautifully presented and well-maintained, this lovely light-filled home with wrap around balcony offers a great opportunity to make a venture into the local property market. With an affordable price tag, this sound home would also be a smart investment, with high demand for good rental properties in Clunes.
Well located in a very convenient residential area, features include, 3 well sized bedrooms 2 with Built in robes, spacious bathroom and separate toilet. A Modern Kitchen with dining area and a huge Lounge & Family room complete with Coonara wood heater and reverse cycle split system contribute to make this a wonderful opportunity for comfortable living. Wall to wall carpets in the bedroom and living areas and a huge laundry/mudroom with external access.
A double lock up garage, Garden shed, Chook pen and run and a sitting on approx 1000 square metres with a spacious and private rear yard with established gardens make this home ideal for owner occupiers and investors alike.

With a freshly painted exterior, the open plan design is inclusive in its layout with spacious tiled dining area, new carpet throughout, new Ultimate wood heater plus new internal blinds & drapes. The fourth bedroom/bungalow attached to the rear, has hanging & storage space, open shelving, timber dado, TV point & separate toilet. Ideal for teenagers, home office or when extra family & friends stay over.

Sunblinds

Air-conditioner

Entertaining area
Double Carport & Caravan port

Easy care garden with abundant fruiting Pear Tree
Enclosed backyard, great for toddlers or pets.

Description:
Stunning 20 acre Allotment with Views to Mt Beckworth.
Situated on the Exclusive Beckworth Court Rd in Historic Clunes is this sensational 20-acre lifestyle block with an expansive approved building envelope, ready for you to build your dream family home (STCA).
Ideal for Livestock or Horses among many other pursuits, and with multiple shade belts and your own creek meandering along the rear of the block and fertile soil.
Only 5 minutes drive to the centre of Clunes, 20 Minutes Commute to Ballarat, 30 minutes to Daylesford, and a 90 minute commute to Melbournes CBD, it is the ideal combination of convenience and seclusion.
Boasting spectacular views to Mount Beckworth and shady Gums scattered across the mainly cleared block, don't miss your opportunity to strike gold here!
Power passes directly outside the front fence
20 Acres ideal for many farming/leisure pursuits
Rural Living Zone
Spectacular Views to Mt Beckworth
Build your Forever home
Insights: 100 Beckworth Court Road, Clunes VIC 3370 was last sold in 2019.

Description:
Dutch Cottage - Circa 1888
Opportunity not to be missed, this delightful cottage nestled in the heart of Clunes will impress on inspection.
Light bright open plan living spaces, including modern kitchen and appliances to complement. Walk through to the separate formal living area and onto the characteristically wide hallway with polished floorboards to the 2 generous sized bedrooms. Master bedroom refurbishments include walk in robe and ensuite. The main bathroom boasts a huge 1500 x 900mm walk in shower and a deep bath to relax. Outside, enjoy a good book, or gather with friends of the deck in the sunshine. A cottage would not be complete without the iconic picket fence, and easy care garden, this property is no exception.
Single carport, plus workshop all on a perfect sized corner allotment of approx. 500m2
Located an hour and half from Melbourne, Clunes makes an easy drive for the country weekend getaway or permanent tree change.

Description:
Family home with stunning valley views
Enjoy panoramic views of the Clunes Valley from this high set homestead on 2 acres (approx.) only moments from the beautiful hamlet of Clunes. The red cedar, family homestead is located in an elevated position on a corner block with wrap-around verandahs to enjoy the stunning sunrises or to entertain from.
With generous living and dining spaces, raked ceilings and warmth that comes from both gas ducted heating and split system air conditioning, the home is ideal for either a permanent residence or a wonderful lifestyle weekender. There is plenty of room for the kids to run around, grow vegetables or even have your own chicken coop.
The entertainer’s kitchen is fully equipped with large walk-in-pantry and spectacular eastern views. The home also comprises a master bedroom with WIR and a newly renovated ensuite, a further three bedrooms, refurbished family bathroom and a study.
The property has excellent infrastructure including a dam, grid connected solar panels, a double carport, town water and NBN is available. Only a few minutes drive to the town centre of Clunes, 30 minutes to Ballarat and 75 minutes to Melbourne.
The charming village of Clunes was where Victorian gold rush fever sparked in the 1850’s and is considered the best collection of 19th century buildings in Australia. Its picturesque streets and beautifully preserved architecture makes it a tourist destination. It is also home to regional Australia’s largest book event and one of only 15 internationally recognised Booktowns in the world.

Description:
Price Reduced!!! Elevated Clunes Family home on 2 Titles and Dual Street Frontage.
With its elevated position and stunning views, this recently renovated family home on 2 titles of 1925m2 & 400m2(approx.) is an oasis for those seeking space and privacy just moments from the centre of Historic Clunes.
This home has the added benefit of developing the 2nd 400m2 title with frontage to George Street(STCA).
The beautiful open plan living and family zones are modern and stylish, plus the new kitchen has a fully plumbed central island bench.
Three sets of double doors open from the living areas to the huge timber deck, making for ideal entertaining in the Summer months.
The sunroom, with its wide windows, looks over the township, across to beautiful Mount Beckworth and the famous lollipop tree, giving you the perfect spot to relax, read and de-stress.
The light-filled bathroom has also been recently remodelled, with a modern free-standing bath, walk in shower and stunning timber vanity.
The 3 spacious bedrooms all have timber flooring, with their own country vista views.
Additionally, there is a 2 car lock up garage, separate workshop, expansive chicken-coop (or large shed) and a semi enclosed gazebo in the gardens.
Add to this Solar power and the unique potential to build a second home facing George St(STCA), this is a true opportunity!
2 titles of 1925m2 & 400m2(approx.).
Option to develop second block on George Street (STCA).
Amazing views over Clunes.
New modern Kitchen and Bathroom.
Stunning open plan living.

RURAL LAND - EACH 2.94 ACRES (11,923 SQM)

1950's Triple Fronted Brick Veneer
Conveniently located for all that Clunes has to offer:
3 Big Bedrooms (2x BIR)
Lounge room with in built wood fireplace, Split system, ceiling fan
Good size kitchen has great working space with double St George electric oven
Double door entry 1200 wide Hallways
Bathroom with Shower and bath
Separate Laundry & Toilet,
Timber floorboards underneath carpet
Rear veranda with double doors leading from 3rd bedroom or 2nd living.
Double Lock up Garage plus workshop & garden shed
Set on corner block
Enclosed easy to manage backyard
Currently tenanted on periodical lease

Description:
Vogue Sophistication and Rural Tranquillity Unite
Situated in the historic township of Clunes this brand new home is the epitome of quality and opulence and is arguably one of the district's finest. Positioned on a family friendly one-acre allotment, this expansive home accommodates four double bedrooms, grand king-sized master, lavish ensuite with his and her vanity's and luxury double rain shower. The fully appointed chef's kitchen is in a class of its own with stunning stone benchtops, quality stainless appliances and an equally luxurious butler's pantry equipped with dishwasher, sink and an abundance of cupboard and bench space. Ideal for the larger family, the home offers three separate living zones comprising of theatre room, open plan family room and separate formal lounge/parents retreat plus a separate study/home office. Year round comfort is assured with elegant Scandia wood heating and two reverse cycle split systems. Other features include main bathroom with separate shower and bath, spacious laundry, multiple TV and data points to every room and quality window furnishings and light fittings through-out. An oversized double lock up garage provides direct access to the home and there is a covered alfresco with brick fire pit for year round entertaining. The property is well fenced with ample space for a shed and rear access is to the land is available. Clunes is well situated and commuter friendly within a 30-minute drive to central Ballarat and 20 minutes to the Western Freeway for easy access to Melbourne in under two hours.
Insights: 61 Albert Street, Clunes VIC 3370 was last sold in 2019.

Description:
One of the best views in Clunes!
15 acres of dark volcanic soil with a westerly slope and amazing views to Mount Beckworth. Planning approval easily achieved with local planning consultants. Very little work has been done to the property except for fencing and ploughing.
A blank canvas ready for your dream home!
If you are looking for a tree change and a welcoming community you can't get any better than Clunes, one of the most vibrant small towns in Central Victoria.
Insights: 225 Learmonth Rd, Clunes VIC 3370 was last sold in 2020.

Description:
Six Bedroom Home On 12 Acres Close To Clunes Village
Superbly located on the edge of the historic township of Clunes, this light filled, large proportioned log cabin home & land will provide a lifestyle which everyone dreams of with approx 37 squares of living space.
Large proportions inside and generous room outdoors, with 12 acres, adequate shedding & a six bedroom home to nurture your family now & into the future.
Filled with light with large panoramic windows & an enticing neutral palette, this 30 square floor plan transports you around three massive living domains, six bedrooms, two modern bathrooms and wide elevated verandas to further rest & unwind.
Formal & casual zones complement each other, with the family room & casual meals area temperature controlled by a strategically placed split system, while the connecting kitchen is awash with natural light & perfectly appointed with stainless steel appliances (including a 900mm cooker), high polished floor tiles & a large return island bench/counter.
The formal lounge/dining room is also light & airy with a freestanding combustion heater, ceiling fan & air conditioner keeping the room completely comfortable.
The master suite offers a large walk in robe & ensuite with corner spa plus a large parents retreat to get away from the kids, while the four further bedrooms (individually styled) share the family bathroom which boasts a frameless shower, bath, twin vanities & mirrors along with a separate toilet.
Positioned along a sealed road with a raw meandering driveway, this lifestyle property provides a 46 x 25m horse arena, a 17 x 7m shed, which incorporates a workshop with 2 phase power plus horse tac room, two separate carports along with town water plus a gravity fed water tank. Recently the power supply has been upgraded from the road underground to the home with a new meter box.
Scattered trees, a chicken coop & a fabulous outdoor living area add to its appeal, with plenty of land to play with thrown in as a bonus. Call today to arrange a private inspection.
Insights: 230 McDonalds Road, Clunes VIC 3370 was last sold in 2019.

Description:
Stunning Contemporary Homestead on over 1/2 an Acre.
Situated in a prime position, on over half an acre of beautiful gardens and walking distance to the centre of Historical Clunes is this immaculate and spacious 4 bedroom brick homestead.
From the timber decked veranda that wraps around 3 sides of the home, you step through the front door to a semi-formal entrance and into the expansive living areas. Polished cypress pine floors to all living areas and wall to wall carpet in all bedrooms, all with Built in robes and ceiling fans, the master with walk through robes and full en suite.
The full country kitchen offers plenty of cupboard space, dishwasher, quality electric appliances, ceramic cook-top and complete with butlers pantry. From there the open plan dining room opens via sliding doors to the expansive covered entertaining area, ideal for family get togethers.
The stunning landscaped rear gardens include a manicured dry creek bed feature, fire pit, peppercorn and silver birch trees and a separate covered BBQ area, with 7-foot hedges bordering the property for that added touch of privacy.
The home includes an attached double garage with high clearance and remote entry along with a separate powered 2 bay shed with additional workshop/potting room with concrete floors.
Topped off with evaporative cooling, split systems and combustion heating, and plenty of space for the caravan, this property is available by private inspection. Please contact the agent to arrange a viewing.
Insights: 38 Canterbury Street, Clunes VIC 3370 was last sold in 2019 and 11 other 4 bedroom house in Clunes have recently been sold.
